name: Butterfly Catcher (Renae Aurisch, Tyler Marcelis, SomewhatDecent)
name_original: Butterfly Catcher (Renae Aurisch, Tyler Marcelis, SomewhatDecent)
description:
Butterfly Catcher is a unique virtual reality experience where the player has the opportunity to interact with butterflies while simultaneously learning about their behaviours, ecosystems and history. Focusing on passing on exciting knowledge about endangered Australian butterflies to the player base, Butterfly Catcher allows for players to really feel like they’re with the butterflies they’re learning about.

FEATURES:

  • Traverse 3 different Australian butterfly habitats
  • Capture butterflies with harmless bubble wand
  • Learn facts about Australian butterflies
  • Localisation for English and Mandarin (Chinese)
  • Realistic butterfly behaviours

Created in 3 weeks as a student project at the Academy of Interactive Entertainment (1 week for artists).

Closer Look is:

  • Tessa Touchette
  • Brandon Lee Miller
  • Renae Aurisch
  • Talis Wagner
  • Tyler Marcelis
  • Nicholaos Spatalis
  • Tamara Lynch
  • Nghia Do
